channel.title: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?"

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: i just got Syalker girl level 2 on my first try o.O it took a billion trys to get timmy level 2 o.O O.o

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: Yes, Panda can only be leveled in Season 2.

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded:
For season 2?
Because if not then i would be suprised.

list of my lvl 2 allies
Timmy
Almost billy
Lil'Bo
Lil'ro

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: The Light a Fire mission is Pandabear's leveling mission, I think.

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded:
Billy lvl2.- Defeat evil pirates B rank need to be SP jonin.
To get lil'shammy,lil'bo,and lilro level 2-special items.Special jonin
Timmylvl2-Special Jonin Teach a New soulreaper
Shorty lvl 2- Jonin get all reaper allie then do this mission to save her and she becomes level 2.
The rest are mostly Need SP Jonin to get lvl 2

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: Yea. I'm a special jounin now, so I don't know if it's because of that, or if it's something that was just added recently.

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: I just got a c-rank mission today for the nin Light a Fire that says an ally can level up, but am not sure who it is yet. I will post something if I find out any info.

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded:
From what I've gatheredâ€¦

All Season 1 Lvl. 2 allies except for Emosuke require Special Jonin.
All the Season 2 allies that you can get before Special Jonin and have a Lvl. 2 form (Bruce Jr., Spot, Red Rover, Terri, Meatballs, Yuri), you can level to Lvl. 2 before special Jonin.

item.title: Re: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded: Yeah you do need to be Sp. Jonin to level Lil, Shammy, Ro and Bo. The special missions won't appear if you're a Chunin.

item.title: Has anybody found out if you need certain ranks for lv2 chars?
item.content:encoded:
Working on the Ro-Sham-Bo Redux, or about to anyway. Do you need to be Sp. Jonin to do it? It was mentioned you needed that for the Burger quest, was wondering about this one also now :P

We really should think about including requirements in rank for this stuff on the info :)
